mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board ( seq, header, title, content, read_count, recommend, div, reg_id, reg_dt, mod_dt, is_modded, workspace_seq ) VALUES ( board_seq.nextVal, #{header}, #{title}, #{content}, 0, 0, #{div}, #{regId}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 0, #{workspaceSeq} )
mapper.select: SELECT seq, header, title, content, read_count as readCount, recommend, div, reg_id as regId, reg_dt as regDt, mod_dt as modDt, is_modded as isModded, workspace_seq as workspaceSeq FROM board Where seq = #{seq}
SELECT seq, header, title, content, read_count as readCount, recommend, div, reg_id as regId, reg_dt as regDt, mod_dt as modDt, is_modded as isModded FROM board Where workspace_seq = #{workspaceSeq}

Select count(*) From board Where workspace_seq=#{workspaceSeq}
title like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
content like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
reg_id like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'

Select B.* From (Select ROWNUM as RNUM, A.* From (Select * From board Where workspace_seq = #{workspaceSeq}
title like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
content like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
reg_id like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
Order By reg_dt DESC)A Where ROWNUM <= #{pageNum} * #{pageSize})B Where 1 + (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{pageSize} <= RNUM
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET header = #{header}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, read_count = #{readCount}, recommend = #{recommend}, mod_dt = SYSDATE, is_modded = 1 WHERE seq = #{seq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM board WHERE seq = #{seq} And reg_id = #{regId}
